meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Glendora - Apartments in Glendora, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: This is not just apartment living. This is living up. We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, recreation, culture and possibility, Avalon Glendora now offers apartment homes for lease. Inside our refreshing community, you'll find thoughtfully-designed 1-, 2- & 3- bedroom apartment homes. Imagine entertaining in well-appointed kitchens with ENERGY STAR Â® stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and contemporary lighting. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, WAG pet spa and park, a sparkling saltwater swimming pool and multiple outdoor courtyards complete with seating, fireplaces and BBQ areas. In addition, Avalon Glendora is located on historic Route 66, with easy access to Freeways 210 and 57 and close proximity to historic downtown Glendora. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

This is living up. We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, recreation, culture and possibility, Avalon Glendora now offers apartment homes for lease. Inside our refreshing community, you'll find thoughtfully-designed 1-, 2- & 3- bedroom apartment homes. Imagine entertaining in well-appointed kitchens with ENERGY STAR Â® stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and contemporary lighting. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, WAG pet spa and park, a sparkling saltwater swimming pool and multiple outdoor courtyards complete with seating, fireplaces and BBQ areas. In addition, Avalon Glendora is located on historic Route 66, with easy access to Freeways 210 and 57 and close proximity to historic downtown Glendora. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.
